item.title: vibe coding writeup
item.description: Challenge description https://gemini.google.com/share/fe4fdfc523f4 (yes entire challange was generated as ‘secure’ python code by gemini, and same code was on the server, except with different flag) Solution generated code looks ‘secure’ import sys # Flag stored here secret = "zeroday{fake_flag}" # Blacklist setup BLACKLIST = ["secret", "()", "[", "]", "{", "}", "'", '"', "import", "os", "globals", "locals", "_", "getattr", "dir", "eval", "exec", "system"] MAX_LEN = 6 print("Welcome to the 6-character Python jail!
